lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Trouble yourselves no further: pray you, hasten Your generals after.

lines.speaker: agrippa
lines.text: Sir, Mark Antony Will e'en but kiss Octavia, and we'll follow.

lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Till I shall see you in your soldier's dress, Which will become you both, farewell.

lines.speaker: mecaenas
lines.text: We shall, As I conceive the journey, be at the Mount Before you, Lepidus.

lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Your way is shorter; My purposes do draw me much about: You'll win two days upon me.
